DOC.brief_title: Effect Vitamin D Status Clinical Pregnancy Rates Following Intra Cytoplasmic Sperm Injection
DOC.detailed_description: PATIENTS AND METHODS Protocol Outline : The Study : Study site : Ain Shams University Maternity Hospital . Study Design : A prospective Cohort study . Study setting : The study conduct Ain Shams University Maternity Hospital . Study population : The study include woman plan undergo IVF due unexplained infertility . Methodology : The study approve hospital ethic committee . All include woman undergo following : - History taking . - General abdominal examination . - Vaginal examination assessment - Pelvic ultrasound . - Routine laboratory investigation include complete blood picture , hematocrit , liver kidney function test coagulation profile . - Preoperative senior anesthetist assessment . - Hysteroscopy . All patient undergo IVF . Serum 25 ( OH ) D sample collect within1 week oocyte retrieval . Whole blood specimen collect serum separator tube use acceptable medical technique avoid hemolysis . Ultrasound-guided fresh embryo transfer perform day 5 fertilization . clinical pregnancy confirm observation intrauterine sac visible ultrasound perform 4-5 week embryo transfer . Measurement Outcomes 1. serum 25 ( OH ) D level . 2 . Number oocyte . Most study put optimal number retrieve oocytes 10 15 . 3 . The implantation rate : Calculated number gestational sac observe ultrasound divide number embryo transfer , multiply 100 . 4 . Number gestational sac .
DOC.criteria: Age 20 35 year old . Body mass index 20 30 . Unexplained infertility . Folliclestimulating hormone level 12 IU/L low ( baseline level , cycle day 3 ) . Normal hysteroscopy ( healthy uterus fibroid growth ) Fresh embryo transfer 2 blastocyst stage . Embryo transfer day 5 fertilization Women young 20 year old old 35 year old . Previous one fail IVF . Uncorrected congenital acquire uterine anomaly . Other cause infertility rather unexplained infertility . Less 2 embryo transfer , cleavage stager frozen embryo transfer .
DOC.keyword: Vitamin D follow intra cytoplasmic sperm injection
